General.Name: InfoVision Optoelectronics Kunshan Co Ltd
General.Description: InfoVision Optoelectronics (Kunshan) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of thin film transistor liquid crystal display panels in China. Its products include mobile communication panels, tablet panels, laptop panels, industrial control panels, vehicle display panels, and desktop monitor panels. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.
General.Address: NO.1 Long Teng Road, Kunshan, China, 215300
